name: Re: Pear
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move, Space Bar to attack

Re:Pear is a Unity2D game made during the Global Game Jam 2020. I was joined by 5 other team members when working on this project. 

You play as Paddington Pear, part of a pair of Pears whose marriage is in peril, as he tries to repair said marriage. This game was made in 48 hours, under the jam's theme of "Repair".

All assets were made during the course of GGJ 2020. All the music was created by https://soundcloud.com/kevin-eaton-591125316
